name: Color Similarity
description:
How to play :
  1. Look at the colors of two cubes
  2. Deside if they are the same
  3. Read the statement
  4. Press the right button corresponding the statement
You can play using arrow keys as well
  • Left arrow key for True
  • Right arrow key for False

Space/Enter - Start/Restart the game
Escape - Main Menu

The more you progress the harder it will be to distinguish the colors.
